Verses: 1 naan Thirumbavum En Kangalai Ereduththup Paarkkaiyil, Idho, Parakkira Oru Pusthagachchurulaik Kanden.
2 thoodhan: Nee Kaangiradhu Ennavendru Kettaar; Parakkira Oru Pusthagachchurulaik Kaangiren, Adhin Neelam Irubadhu Muzhamum Adhin Agalam Paththumuzhamumaayirukkiradhu Endren.

3 appozhudhu Avar: Idhu Boomiyinmeedhengum Purappattuppogira Saabam; Endhath Thirudanum Adhin Oru Puraththilirukkiradhinpadiye Azhikkappattuppovaan; Aanaiyidugira Evanum, Adhin Marupuraththil Irukkiradhinpadiye Azhikkappattuppovaan.

4 adhu Thirudan Veettilum, En Naamaththaikkondu Poiyaanaiyidugiravan Veettilum Vandhu, Avanavanveettin Naduvile Thangi, Adhai Adhin Marangalodum Adhin Kallugalodunkooda Nirmoolamaakkumpadi Adhaip Purappattuppogappannuven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
5 pinbu Ennode Pesina Thoodhan Veliye Vandhu Ennai Nokki: Nee Un Kangalai Ereduththu, Purappattuvarugiradhai Ennavendru Paar Endraar.
6 adhu Ennavendru Ketten; Adharku Avar: Adhu Purappattuvarugiradhaagiya Oru Marakkaal Endraar. Pinnum Avar Boomiyengum Idhudhaan Avargaludaiya Kannokkam Endraar.
7 idho, Oru Thaalandhu Niraiyaana Eeyamoodi Thookkivarappattadhu; Marakkaalin Naduvile Oru Sthree Utkaarndhirundhaal.
8 appozhudhu Avar: Ival Akkiramakkaari Endru Solli, Avalai Marakkaalukkulle Thalli Eeyakkattiyai Adhin Vaayile Pottaar.

9 appozhudhu Naan En Kangalai Ereduththu, Idho, Purappattuvarugira Irandu Sthreegalaik Kanden; Avargalukku Naaraiyin Settaigalukkoththa Settaigal Irundhadhu; Avargal Settaigalil Kaatrirundhadhu; Ivargal Marakkaalai Boomikkum Vaanaththukkum Naduvaaith Thookkikkondu Ponaargal.
10 naan Ennode Pesina Thoodhanai Nokki: Ivargal Marakkaalai Enge Kondupogiraargal Endru Ketten.
11 adharku Avar Sineyaar Dhesaththile Adharku Oru Veettaik Kattumpadikku Adhaik Kondupogiraargal; Ange Adhu Sthaabikkappattu, Than Nilaiyile Vaikkappadum Endraar.
